entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mascouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
